ezTrack 0.1.0

    Interactive Map of Tracking Data

    Source: R/ez_map.R
    ez_map.Rd

    Display animal tracks on an interactive Leaflet map with intuitive styling arguments. Optionally subset the data by a start and end date. Supports plotting tracks (lines and points) and home ranges (POLYGON or MULTIPOLYGON). By default, points and paths are colored by `id`.

    Usage

    ez_map(
  data,
  plotPath = TRUE,
  plotPoints = TRUE,
  pointRadius = 4,
  pointColor = "blue",
  pointOpacity = 0.8,
  pointStroke = TRUE,
  pointStrokeColor = "black",
  pathColor = "blue",
  pathWidth = 2,
  pathOpacity = 1,
  homeRangeColor = "blue",
  colorPalette = "viridis",
  showLabels = TRUE,
  startDate = NULL,
  endDate = NULL
)

    Arguments

    data

    A data frame or `sf` object with columns `id`, `timestamp`, `x`, and `y`.

    plotPath

    Logical, whether to draw path lines. Default is TRUE.

    plotPoints

    Logical, whether to draw points. Default is TRUE.

    pointRadius

    Numeric, size of point markers. Default is 4.

    pointColor

    CSS color string or column name to color points. Default is `"id"`.

    pointOpacity

    Numeric (0–1), fill opacity for points. Default is 0.8.

    pointStroke

    Logical, whether to draw borders around points. Default is TRUE.

    pointStrokeColor

    Border color for points. Default is "black".

    pathColor

    CSS color string or column name to color paths. Default is `"id"`.

    pathWidth

    Line width of paths. Default is 2.

    pathOpacity

    Numeric (0–1), opacity of paths. Default is 1.

    homeRangeColor

    CSS color string or column name to color polygon geometries. Default is "blue".

    colorPalette

    Palette to use if coloring by `id` or another column. Supports "viridis", "plasma", "inferno", "magma", "cividis", "turbo", or "Set1". Default is "viridis".

    showLabels

    Logical, show ID + timestamp in hover labels. Default is TRUE.

    startDate

    Optional. A `Date` object or a date string (e.g., "2021-01-01").

    endDate

    Optional. A `Date` object or a date string (e.g., "2021-12-31").

    Value

    A `leaflet` map object.
